properties.Location: Canal From Walapane Hospital to Subodagama Mr. R.R.Karunarathna's House
properties.Observatio: This is not a stream or canal, A drain side of the road, During the rainy season the road gets damaged due to the flow of huge water
properties.Descriptio: Construction of 1:3:6 (1 1/2") ct concrete retaining wall (height 0.9m, top width 0.15m, 0.45m high steps x 02, each of 0.15m step width & bottom width 0.45m)Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows,
